detectors.description:
ERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Onbuff.sol#50-57) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount,ERC20: transfer amount exceeds balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Onbuff.sol#54)
	- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Onbuff.sol#55)

	- [_balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Onbuff.sol#L55)

detectors.description:
Onbuff (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Onbuff.sol#127-146) inherits the contract, there is a conflict between state variables and functions
	Conflicting functions and state variables:
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Onbuff.sol#27-29)
	- IERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Onbuff.sol#3)
	- IERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Onbuff.sol#6)
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Onbuff.sol#33-36)
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Onbuff.sol#30-32)
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Onbuff.sol#40-43)
	- ERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Onbuff.sol#44-48)
	- IERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Onbuff.sol#7)
	- IERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Onbuff.sol#5)
	- IERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Onbuff.sol#8)
	- IERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Onbuff.sol#4)
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Onbuff.sol#37-39)
